protocol.name: P-GSE50520-1
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis ID_REF =  VALUE = Signal ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE =

protocol.name: P-GSE50520-2
protocol.text: 14-day-old seedlings were transferred to liquid MS medium and subsequently estradiol disolved in ethanol (treatment) or ethanol alone (mock) was added to each well. After 4 hours seedlings were collected and directly frozen in liquid nitrogen for storage.

protocol.name: P-GSE50520-3
protocol.text: T3 seeds were stratified on plate for 72 h in the dark at 4°C and then transferred to 22°C with a 16-h light (100 μE m−2 s−1)/8-h dark period.

protocol.name: P-GSE50520-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with the Plant RNAeasy kit (Qiagen)

protocol.name: P-GSE50520-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA

protocol.name: P-GSE50520-6
protocol.text: Hybridizations against Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array (GeneChip System®, Affymetrix) chips were performed at 45 °C for 16 h, in the Affymetrix GeneChip Workstation (hybridization oven 640, Fluidics Station 450), using 10 µg of Biotin-labeled aRNA, according to the manufacturer's protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE50520-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned by use of the Affymetrix GeneChip Workstation Scanner 3000.
